name: Planet Nine
notes: Albedo estimated from KBOs; radius from similar exoplanets; 2025 updated with https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.3847/1538-4357/ad98f6; updated with https://arxiv.org/abs/2108.09868; updated with https://arxiv.org/pdf/2110.13117.pdf and https://arxiv.org/pdf/2203.07642.pdf and https://data.caltech.edu/records/0yypt-j3n93
notes2: These weren't used, but https://arxiv.org/pdf/2205.07675.pdf https://arxiv.org/pdf/2210.04147.pdf https://arxiv.org/pdf/2111.03831.pdf were interesting too
